title: Does the LOL esports live have a schedule listed somewhere?
body: I googled it and couldn't find much that was helpful.

replies.body:
Someone made a Google Calendar, nothing fancy, but it does have a lot of the LoL international stuff and the doc is constantly updated:
https://www.google.com/calendar/embed?src=bWxmdWlraGFzcTFvMTdqazM4dmdzM29xbXNAZ3JvdXAuY2FsZW5kYXIuZ29vZ2xlLmNvbQ

Do keep in mind it keeps about a week in advance, so it may not be super helpful if you want it for extended warning.
